org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRSensorData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRSensorData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class OVRSensorData
extends Struct
    Specifies a reading we can query from the sensor.

    ovrSensorData members

    MemberTypeDescription
    AccelerometerovrVector3facceleration reading in m/s^2
    GyroovrVector3frotation rate in rad/s
    MagnetometerovrVector3fmagnetic field in Gauss
    Temperaturefloattemperature of the sensor in degrees Celsius
    TimeInSecondsfloattime when the reported IMU reading took place, in seconds

    • Constructor Detail

      • OVRSensorData

        public OVRSensorData(long struct)
        Creates a OVRSensorData instance at the specified memory address.

      • OVRSensorData

        public OVRSensorData(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a OVRSensorData instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
